name: Heatmap
introduction:
- The Heatmap is conducted annually to identify the top supervisory risks across the EU to prioritise ESMA’s convergence and NCAs’ supervisory work in the areas posing the highest risk to investor protection, financial stability, and orderly markets at EU level. 
- The Heatmap currently encompasses the following sectors: investment management, investment services, issuers disclosure, market abuse, trading & post-trading, and CCP.
